from pico2d import * from boy import Boy
open_canvas() boy = Boy()
running = True while running: handle_events = get_events() for event in handle_events: if event.type == SDL_QUIT: running = False else: boy.handle_event(event) boy.update() clear_canvas() boy.draw() update_canvas() delay(0.03) close_canvas()
